articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of the men's final in the French Open at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open men's final LIVE: Alcaraz v Zverev - text & radio commentary

articles.description: India play Pakistan in New York on Sunday but it is unlikely to eclipse the match of 1989 which brought about a national crisis.
articles.title: India v Pakistan: New York fixture in 1989 between sides prompted 'gravest crisis'

articles.description: England white-ball coach Matthew Mott and captain Jos Buttler have reached the point of no return and if the next week does not go their way, their journey could be over.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England's Jos Buttler and Matthew Mott have reached the point of no return

articles.description: George Russell says there is “more to come” from Mercedes after he took their first pole position for nearly a year at the Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: George Russell says 'more to come' from Mercedes after Montreal pole

articles.description: With Germany's form having declined since their 2014 World Cup win, is their lack of a world-class number nine proving costly?
articles.title: Euro 2024: How Germany are looking for way around lack of world-class striker

articles.description: Gareth Southgate welcomes Jude Bellingham into the England camp but says “we are not putting everything on” him.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: England boss Gareth Southgate says 'we're not putting everything on him'

articles.description: Czech Republic midfielder Michal Sadilek is forced to pull out of Euro 2024 after injuring his leg when he fell off a bike.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Czech Republic's Michal Sadilek out with injury after falling off bike

articles.description: French Open winner Iga Swiatek's aura at Roland Garros is becoming so great that she is being dubbed the 'Queen of Clay' - and tipped for a career Grand Slam.
articles.title: French Open 2024: From stress to serenity - how Iga Swiatek won 'surreal' fifth major

articles.description: Teenage forward Endrick scores a stoppage-time winner as Brazil beat Mexico 3-2 in a Copa America warm-up match in Texas.
articles.title: Brazil 3-2 Mexico: Endrick scores injury-time winner

articles.description: World number seven Jon Rahm withdraws after just six holes of the second round of LIV Golf Houston on Saturday suffering an infection in his left foot.
articles.title: Jon Rahm suffers injury with less than a week until US Open
